DOCNAME: CASE OF PARAMONOV AND OTHERS v. RUSSIA
CONCLUSION: Violation of Article 6 - Right to a fair trial (Article 6 - Criminal proceedings;Article 6-1 - Fair hearing)
TEXT: CARDINAL . NORP The list of applicants and the relevant details of the applications are set out in the appended table .
CARDINAL . The applicants complained that they had been unfairly convicted of drug offences following entrapment by ORG agents .
